card_text: Look at 1 random card in your opponent's hand, then apply 1 of the following effects.$N●Discard both that opponent's card and 1 card from your hand of the same type (Monster, Spell, or Trap), then add this card from the field to your opponent's hand, and if you do, draw 1 card.$N●Lose 1000 LP.$NYou can only activate 1 "Old Mind" per turn.
